Hi.

The perlscripts in the distro (e.g. make_reports.pl) are no longer working due - I assume to an extra field in the crawl.log header-lines
The script has not been updated to the new format of e.g hosts-report.txt

Does anyone maintain these ? - if so it would be nice if they could be updated to reflect the state of the standard heritrix output.

best

-- 
Bjarne Andersen
State and University Library, Aarhus
Denmark

--Boundary_(ID_Z9RRnwSlZn6Re8Yp0FC6Xg)
